entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
